verses.text: \w But|strong="G1161"\w* there \w were|strong="G1096"\w* false \w prophets|strong="G5578"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* there shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* false \w teachers|strong="G5572"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w who|strong="G3748"\w* privily shall bring \w in|strong="G3919"\w* \w damnable|strong="G0684"\w* \w heresies|strong="G0139"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w denying|strong="G0720"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G1203"\w* that \w bought|strong="G0059"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, and bring \w upon|strong="G1863"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w swift|strong="G5031"\w* \w destruction|strong="G0684"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* shall \w follow|strong="G1811"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* pernicious \w ways|strong="G0684"\w*; by reason \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w* of \w truth|strong="G0225"\w* shall be evil spoken \w of|strong="G0987"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* \w covetousness|strong="G4124"\w* shall \w they|strong="G1710"\w* with \w feigned|strong="G4112"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w* make merchandise \w of|strong="G1710"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*: \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2917"\w* \w now|strong="G0691"\w* of a long \w time|strong="G1597"\w* \w lingereth|strong="G0691"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w damnation|strong="G0684"\w* \w slumbereth|strong="G3573"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w spared|strong="G5339"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the \w angels|strong="G0032"\w* that \w sinned|strong="G0264"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w cast|strong="G5020"\w* \add them\add* down to \w hell|strong="G5020"\w*, and \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* \add them\add* into \w chains|strong="G4577"\w* of \w darkness|strong="G2217"\w*, to be \w reserved|strong="G5083"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2920"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w spared|strong="G5339"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w the|strong="G2889"\w* \w old|strong="G0744"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w saved|strong="G5442"\w* \w Noah|strong="G3575"\w* the \w eighth|strong="G3590"\w* \add person\add*, a \w preacher|strong="G2783"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*, bringing \w in|strong="G1863"\w* the \w flood|strong="G2627"\w* upon the \w world|strong="G2889"\w* of the \w ungodly|strong="G0765"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w turning|strong="G5077"\w* the \w cities|strong="G4172"\w* of \w Sodom|strong="G4670"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Gomorrha|strong="G1116"\w* into \w ashes|strong="G5077"\w* \w condemned|strong="G2632"\w* \add them\add* with an \w overthrow|strong="G2692"\w*, \w making|strong="G5087"\w* \add them\add* an \w ensample|strong="G5262"\w* unto those that after \w should|strong="G3195"\w* live \w ungodly|strong="G0764"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w delivered|strong="G4506"\w* \w just|strong="G1342"\w* \w Lot|strong="G3091"\w*, \w vexed|strong="G2669"\w* \w with|strong="G5259"\w* the \w filthy|strong="G0766"\w* \w conversation|strong="G0391"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="G0113"\w*:

(\w For|strong="G1063"\w* that righteous \w man|strong="G1342"\w* \w dwelling|strong="G1460"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, in \w seeing|strong="G0990"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w hearing|strong="G0189"\w*, \w vexed|strong="G0928"\w* \add his\add* \w righteous|strong="G1342"\w* \w soul|strong="G5590"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w to|strong="G1537"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w with|strong="G2041"\w* \add their\add* \w unlawful|strong="G0459"\w* \w deeds|strong="G2041"\w*;)

The \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* knoweth \w how|strong="G1492"\w* to \w deliver|strong="G4506"\w* the \w godly|strong="G2152"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w temptations|strong="G3986"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* to \w reserve|strong="G5083"\w* the \w unjust|strong="G0094"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* of \w judgment|strong="G2920"\w* to be \w punished|strong="G2849"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w chiefly|strong="G3122"\w* them that \w walk|strong="G4198"\w* \w after|strong="G3694"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w lust|strong="G1939"\w* of \w uncleanness|strong="G3394"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w despise|strong="G2706"\w* \w government|strong="G2963"\w*. \w Presumptuous|strong="G5113"\w* \add are they\add*, \w selfwilled|strong="G0829"\w*, they \w are|strong="G5141"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w afraid|strong="G5141"\w* to speak evil \w of|strong="G0987"\w* \w dignities|strong="G1391"\w*.

\w Whereas|strong="G3699"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w*, which \w are|strong="G5607"\w* \w greater|strong="G3173"\w* in \w power|strong="G2479"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w might|strong="G1411"\w*, \w bring|strong="G5342"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w railing|strong="G0989"\w* \w accusation|strong="G2920"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w before|strong="G3844"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w natural|strong="G5446"\w* \w brute|strong="G0249"\w* \w beasts|strong="G2226"\w*, \w made|strong="G1080"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* be \w taken|strong="G0259"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w destroyed|strong="G5356"\w*, speak \w evil|strong="G0987"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* the things \w that|strong="G3739"\w* they understand \w not|strong="G0050"\w*; and shall utterly \w perish|strong="G2704"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* their \w own|strong="G0846"\w* \w corruption|strong="G5356"\w*;

And shall \w receive|strong="G2865"\w* the \w reward|strong="G3408"\w* of \w unrighteousness|strong="G0093"\w*, \add as\add* they that count \w it|strong="G2233"\w* \w pleasure|strong="G2237"\w* to \w riot|strong="G5172"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the day \w time|strong="G2250"\w*. \w Spots|strong="G4696"\w* \add they are\add* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w blemishes|strong="G3470"\w*, sporting \w themselves|strong="G1792"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* their \w own|strong="G0846"\w* \w deceivings|strong="G0539"\w* while they feast \w with|strong="G4910"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*;

\w Having|strong="G2192"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w* \w full|strong="G3324"\w* of \w adultery|strong="G3428"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* that cannot \w cease|strong="G0180"\w* from \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*; \w beguiling|strong="G1185"\w* \w unstable|strong="G0793"\w* \w souls|strong="G5590"\w*: an \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* they have \w exercised|strong="G1128"\w* with covetous \w practices|strong="G4124"\w*; \w cursed|strong="G2671"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w*:

Which have \w forsaken|strong="G2641"\w* the \w right|strong="G2117"\w* \w way|strong="G3598"\w*, and are gone \w astray|strong="G4105"\w*, \w following|strong="G1811"\w* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w* of \w Balaam|strong="G0903"\w* \add the son\add* of \w Bosor|strong="G1007"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w loved|strong="G0025"\w* the \w wages|strong="G3408"\w* of \w unrighteousness|strong="G0093"\w*;

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w was|strong="G2192"\w* \w rebuked|strong="G1649"\w* \w for|strong="G3892"\w* \w his|strong="G2398"\w* \w iniquity|strong="G3892"\w*: \w the|strong="G5268"\w* \w dumb|strong="G0880"\w* \w ass|strong="G5268"\w* \w speaking|strong="G5350"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w manâ€™s|strong="G0444"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w forbad|strong="G2967"\w* the \w madness|strong="G3913"\w* of the \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w*.

\w These|strong="G3778"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w wells|strong="G4077"\w* without \w water|strong="G0504"\w*, \w clouds|strong="G3507"\w* that are \w carried|strong="G1643"\w* \w with|strong="G5259"\w* a \w tempest|strong="G2978"\w*; to \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* the \w mist|strong="G2217"\w* of \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w* is \w reserved|strong="G5083"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* when they \w speak|strong="G5350"\w* great \w swelling|strong="G5246"\w* \add words\add* of \w vanity|strong="G3153"\w*, they \w allure|strong="G1185"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* the \w lusts|strong="G1939"\w* of the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \add through much\add* \w wantonness|strong="G0766"\w*, those that were \w clean|strong="G3689"\w* \w escaped|strong="G0668"\w* from them who \w live|strong="G0390"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w error|strong="G4106"\w*.

While they \w promise|strong="G1861"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w liberty|strong="G1657"\w*, they \w themselves|strong="G0846"\w* \w are|strong="G5225"\w* the \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* of \w corruption|strong="G5356"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* of \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* a \w man|strong="G5100"\w* is \w overcome|strong="G2274"\w*, of the \w same|strong="G5129"\w* is he brought in \w bondage|strong="G1402"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* after they have \w escaped|strong="G0668"\w* the \w pollutions|strong="G3393"\w* of the \w world|strong="G2889"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* the \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Saviour|strong="G4990"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, they \w are|strong="G1707"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w entangled|strong="G1707"\w* \w therein|strong="G5125"\w*, and \w overcome|strong="G2274"\w*, the latter \w end|strong="G2078"\w* \w is|strong="G1096"\w* \w worse|strong="G5501"\w* with \w them|strong="G0846"\w* than the \w beginning|strong="G4413"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* it had \w been|strong="G2258"\w* \w better|strong="G2909"\w* for \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* to have \w known|strong="G1921"\w* the \w way|strong="G3598"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*, \w than|strong="G2228"\w*, after they have \w known|strong="G1921"\w* \add it\add*, to \w turn|strong="G1994"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G1785"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w commandment|strong="G1785"\w* \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* it is \w happened|strong="G4819"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* according to \w the|strong="G3942"\w* \w true|strong="G0227"\w* \w proverb|strong="G3942"\w*, The \w dog|strong="G2965"\w* \add is\add* \w turned|strong="G1994"\w* \w to|strong="G1909"\w* his \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w vomit|strong="G1829"\w* \w again|strong="G1994"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w sow|strong="G5300"\w* that was \w washed|strong="G3068"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* her \w wallowing|strong="G2946"\w* in the \w mire|strong="G1004"\w*.
